pullrequest.title: Pass sim id to simulation instance via options

content.html:
For SASC, we're passing URLs so the machine knows where to get SSH keys from:

#!/osrf/cloudsim-widgets/src/a0b023501934088e6e642ca6f8a6988129ea2df6/app/elements/cs-sasc/cs-sascround.html?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#cs-sascround.html-577

I'm open to other approaches, it just wasn't clear to me how the instance can use the simulator id if they don't know who the portal is.
